h4.a: Salute to student leaders

div.p: National Student Leadership Week is April 19â25

Student leaders help make their schools a better place. Thank you to all the class and club officers, team captains, student council members, Superintendentâs Student Advisory Council, and all students who help set high standards in MPS.

h4.a: Support for students

div.p: MPS Foundation rallies community to assist MPS Families

As MPS seeks ways to support students during school closures, the MPS Foundation is driving community efforts to provide relief to families. More than $60,000 has been raised thanks to generous donors including Khris Middleton of the Milwaukee Bucks and the Joseph & Vera Zilber Family Trust Fund. Donate today!

h4.a: Happy Earth Day!

div.p: Students are invited to join the celebration
On the 50th anniversary of Earth Day, which originated in Wisconsin, students and the community are invited to take part in activities and post a picture of the earth in their front windows.

h4.a: Stay connected!

div.p: Keep up with district updates
MPS is maintaining multiple channels to help families stay informed about meals, learning, and community news. Keep in touch!

div.p: Results Updated
MPS provides meals for those with special dietary needs and religious restrictions.

A childâs school should be a second homeâa place that feels welcoming, inviting, and comfortable. Children should walk into school every day and feel safe, connected to caring staff, and that they are in a place that wants them to succeed.

hr.p: If you are having difficulty accessing information on our website due to a disability, please contact us at comm@milwaukee.k12.wi.us and provide the URL of the material you tried to access, the problem you experienced, and your contact information (including your name and phone number), so that we may accommodate your needs.

eNewsletter Sign-Up Whether or not you have a child enrolled at an MPS school or are an employee, all of our community members have a vested interest in what goes on at MPS. Subscribe to our eNewsletters for important updates and information.
